COPY
use Tivins\Dev\JS\Env;

window = Env.init();
class Test
{
    /** @type {string} */
    test;
    /** @type {int} */
    #testPrivate;
    static function log(label, info): void
    {
        Env.window().console.log(label, info);
    }
}

Test.test = 'world';
Test.log("yo", [1, 2, 3]);
window.body.innerText = 'test';
